action.action-desc: Ms. Brownley introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to make permanent certain programs that assist homeless veterans and other veterans with special needs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Helping Homeless Veterans Act of 2023.

section.header: Programs assisting homeless veterans and other veterans with special needs

subsection.header: Treatment for seriously mentally ill and homeless veterans
subsection.text: Section 2031 of such title is amended—
Section 2041 of such title is amended by striking subsection (c).

subsection.header: Financial assistance for supportive services for very low-Income veteran families in permanent housing
subsection.text: Section 2044(e)(1) of such title is amended by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: $420,000,000 for each fiscal year after fiscal year 2024.

subsection.header: Grant program for homeless veterans with special needs
subsection.text: Section 2061(d)(1) of such title is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking each of fiscal years 2007 through 2024 and inserting each fiscal year; and

subsection.text: Section 2066 of such title is amended by striking subsection (d).
